name: Platform81 Limited
tagline: An Award-Winning Digital Marketing & Design Agency
description:
Platform81 is a creative Digital and Design Agency, with offices in Stockport (Manchester) and Bromsgrove (Birmingham). We make our clients look great through a range of services including Brand Identity, Graphic Design, Web Design, Online Marketing, Advertising and Direct Marketing. Our mission is to support you throughout your journey, becoming your marketing partner for all aspects of Digital & Design.
We don't come from a traditional agency background, so we aren't constrained by the conventional 'agency way' of doing things. We don't overprice, we don't charge for every little thing and we create genuine client relationships. We are immensely proud to have worked with a strong and vibrant mix of small and medium sized businesses along with a number of familiar household names.
